reviews.review: It's the only things that's both remotely enjoyable and runs on my garbage thermal throttling Asus craptop

大学时经常和舍友开黑打cs。虽然水平菜，但是那叫青春~~秋季特卖看见有3块钱的包，果断补票了~~花了3个小时，简单难度通关，不是说连简单都打不过，任务提示都没有，有的地方要琢磨半天或者看攻略才知道，比如说，要在某个位置按某个键，从某个位置跳过死胡同，焊枪/炸弹在某个位置，一些地方要用小刀砍~~总的来说，体验很一般，还是打bot有意思~~如果新手引导做好点，并且在一些地方设计的不要那么变态（不看攻略跳不出死胡同系列），再加上更完美的配音，更丰满的故事情节。就是低配版的使命召唤4啊。这两个游戏相差3年的样子~~要是这作火了，再把引擎搞上来，出个续作，没使命召唤什么事了~~

If you like old style CS this is the way to go. if you like whatever the new crap is... well then don't.

The single player campaign that Counter Strike needs in CS:GO. This was really fun, not really story oriented but each level had a certain challenge you had to complete in order to advance to the next country. All in all it was a short campaign but it was a welcomed one.

looks like a good game i guess

Underrated Gem. 
This game was quickly forgotten due to the release of Counter-Strike: Source half a year later. It has been seen by many as a ripoff, due to the lack of brand new content. I will contend this by saying this is the best way to play Counter-Strike on the Goldsrc engine. It features everything that made 1.6 great, with more content. First, you can get the single player, which while not very long or in-depth, might be fun to go through. You also get bots included with the game, no mods needed. This is nice, because both this and 1.6 are lacking in players, and most of the servers have undesirable addons and plugins.

Maps are all intact from 1.6, and they also include versions of some of the classic maps that have updated graphics and art,  taken from the XBox version of Counter-Strike. New models are also included. Old custom maps designed for CS 1-1.6 will work great in CZero. Bot support can even be added in. Overall it's got enough new stuff that I would recommend it to anybody looking to experience classic Counter-Strike, because it has some advantages over 1.6 while still having everything from it available.
i can not stop myself to play this
es como el 1.6 pero con mejores graficos,y esta muy piola lo de las misiones
Stara, ale nadal genialna gra od Valve. Mogę ją polecić każdemu kto lubi starsze tytuły i wyzwania

This game will take you back to your childhood (if your childhood consisted of playing cs 1.6 against bots that is...). If you never cared much about competitive gaming and if playing with bots never bothered you, than this is the game for you.
The bot AI is very competent (unlike CS GO's) and will behave like normal players in a lot of the classic maps featured. you really can't go wrong with this game, plus it will run on basically anything with a CPU in it.

Didn't care much about the "campaign" aspect of the game though, but from what little I've played, I can say that it's pretty fun.
Nearly the same as 1.6. One of the only differences is that you can play offline.
Porque es muy divertido y sus gráficos han evolucionado

This game is very good I already played counter strike a long time ago from the beginning of 1.5 when it was still hal life and to this day I play this game very good, I recommend it to everyone.

I doubt this will be too much of a
generalization if I say that almost every gamer in the world has played or seen
Counter-Strike. You take on the role of 1 of 4 characters from either the
counterterrorist or terrorist team. In each round, you and your team members
must seek and take out your enemies with the use of gun power and tactical
maneuvering. The first team that is totally wiped out loses, and the round
starts over. Your performance in the prior round, such as number of kills, will
determine how much cash you have to spend on new guns and equipment. Besides
eliminating the other team, terrorists can plant bombs in key locations for
detonation and counter terrorists can defuse the bombs or rescue hostages.
